# Project Instructions

This project uses a shared documentation structure across AI assistants.

## Entry Point

See [AGENTS.md](../AGENTS.md) for the primary project documentation.

## Quick Reference

- Check `agents/plans/tasks.md` at session start
- Query `agents/memory/memory.db` before architectural decisions
- Use `agents/skills/` for common workflows
- Reference `agents/personas/server-agent.md` for server management tasks

## Custom Agents

Custom agents are available in `.github/agents/` (if created):

| Agent | Description |
|-------|-------------|
| `@server-agent` | Server management and deployment specialist |
